text: Brownlow Villiers Layard (14 July 1804 – 27 December 1853) was an Irish Whig politician. Layard was elected Whig MP for at the 1841 general election and held the seat until 1847, when he was defeated. ==References== ==External links== * Category:UK MPs 1841–1847 Category:Whig (British political party) MPs for Irish constituencies Category:1804 births Category:1853 deaths
title: Brownlow Layard
